text: The Muppets is a 2011 American musical comedy movie. It starred Jason Segel and Amy Adams. The movie was directed by James Bobin. It was released by Walt Disney Pictures. It involves The Muppets reuniting to put on a show in order to save their theater from a businessman who wants to tear it down to drill for oil. The Muppets was the first Muppet movie released after Disney's acquisition of the franchise. title: The Muppets (movie)
